# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )


if( WIN32 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "guidriverWin32GL" )
elseif( WIN64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "guidriverWin32GL" )
endif()
if( WIN32 )
  add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN64 )
  add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
endif()

if ( WIN32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefGUI gucefMT )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} Opengl32 gucefCORE gucefGUI gucefMT )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUIDRIVERWIN32GL_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefGUI gucefMT )

endif( WIN64 )
